Text:
These are .MDI files and there is no Measure up software. WTF?
I don't want to be the one complaining about a free meal but common can't you put the software out there? I could get a copy of test king  for 5 bucks and do the same thing that you've done here.
.MDI files are Microsoft Imaging Documents, they should be openable in Microsoft Office. I will download and test, and convert and re-upload if possible.
You can find a free Microsoft Imaging Document reader at: http://hot.ee/mdiviewer/
